==== Notes ====

# Graphics card is Nvidia so need to use alternate CD to install.
# i386 version: wireless works with ndiswrapper and the win98 drivers, as per the  information on the <nowiki>[[http://ndiswrapper.sourceforge.net/joomla/index.php?/component/option,com_openwiki/Itemid,33/id,list_o-z/|Ndiswrapper Card List]]</nowiki>.  Chipset is RTL8187B, ID is 0bda:8189.
# i386 version (possibly amd64 as well): to get integrated webcam (id: 5986:0101) to work I used the latest version of uvcvideo together with this patch which simply adds an entry for the webcam (patch submitted to uvcvideo so may appear in later versions):
 <pre>
--- uvc_driver.c.orig   2008-03-07 20:28:12.000000000 +0100
+++ uvc_driver.c        2008-03-07 22:46:10.000000000 +0100
@@ -1831,6 +1831,15 @@
          .bInterfaceSubClass   = 1,
          .bInterfaceProtocol   = 0,
          .driver_info          = UVC_QUIRK_PROBE_MINMAX },
+       /* Packard Bell OEM Webcam - Unknown vendor */
+       { .match_flags          = USB_DEVICE_ID_MATCH_DEVICE
+                               | USB_DEVICE_ID_MATCH_INT_INFO,
+         .idVendor             = 0x5986,
+         .idProduct            = 0x0101,
+         .bInterfaceClass      = USB_CLASS_VIDEO,
+         .bInterfaceSubClass   = 1,
+         .bInterfaceProtocol   = 0,
+         .driver_info          = UVC_QUIRK_PROBE_MINMAX },
        /* Acer Crystal Eye webcam */
        { .match_flags          = USB_DEVICE_ID_MATCH_DEVICE
                                | USB_DEVICE_ID_MATCH_INT_INFO,
 </pre>
1.#4  i386/amd64 version: card reader tested with SD card and Sony Memory Stick.
